page.topic: Settings 'Start' and 'End' Dates in a Calendar Control
page.description: A common use of a calendar control, particularly on travel sites, is to have users enter a 'start' and 'end' date into the calendar, or an 'arrival' and 'departure' date. It is desirable to be able to prevent the user from being able to enter an 'end' date that is before their 'start' date or even the current date. Fortunately this is fairly easy to accomplish in Alpha Anywhere.

section.description: For a visual explanation on how to do this watch this two part video [Part 1], [Part 2], or read the guide below.
